name: Castle Adventure (EmmaLytle)
description:
The villagers fled when the dark knight attacked the castle. Help the villagers reclaim their home and save who is left. 

Controls: 

Left click- Sword attack

WASD- Character Movement

E- Interact

ESC/P- Pause Menu

I left an Easter Egg from one of my previous games in the castle grounds can you find it? 

Credit: 

Forest Sounds from https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/

Castle map modified from GameAssetFactory Medieval Castle modular
